title: Feature flags
subTitle: Feature flags allow you to control the various enabled features in the application

addressComplete.title: Address Complete
addressComplete.description: Enable CanadaPost address completion for forms

formTimer.title: formTimer
formTimer.description: Enable formTimer to delay a form submission and help prevent spam

topBanner.title: Banner
topBanner.description: Enable warning banner to be visible

fileUpload.title: File upload
fileUpload.description: Enable file upload to be added as an element to a form

no-flags-set: No flags are set for this user.
